This is a subtitle of some sort

This is a paragraph of text and stuff. 

                    
                      sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install \
    apt-transport-https \
    ca-certificates \
    curl \
    gnupg-agent \
    software-properties-common \
    example \
    python3-example-lorem
                    
                
                    
                        sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 12345678
                    
                
                    
                        echo "deb https://sub.example.com/ce/dolor lorem ipsum" |\ 
sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/example.list
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install example
